Cyber Claw:





Cyber Claw haulted in mid-air. He thought why even bother with Megatron 
anymore. She could always find a spot that was off the charts of Maximal and 
Predacon territory. That way she would never be bothered again. She her life 
could never be threatened. But she would always have the memories she 
couldn't chase away.

She could see where Megatron's base was. A cave. He hovered near-by it, 
argueing with herself. She knew he wouldn't be alone. He had his troops to 
send before he went out himself to destory her. That was the way he always 
was. That was a reason why she hated him.

Perhaps she could tear in there, taking out a death wish. There were times 
when her memories where so bad, that she wanted to die. She even tried to, 
but it didn't work.

But what was she to do? Leave and continue with the memories of Megatron and 
the hellish way she looked, taking after a male predacon. Or go inside and 
get herself killed.
